name: animation-liquid-button
description: Liquid morphing button with SVG turbulence-driven distortion on hover. Supports primary, secondary, and ghost variants with configurable intensity.
postMessage:
Import and use:

import { LiquidButton } from './components/animation-liquid-button/LiquidButton';

<LiquidButton variant="primary" size="lg" intensity={0.8}>
  Get Started
</LiquidButton>
